      • contextify

        default FunctionFactory<T,R> contextify(SupplierFactory<Context> contextSupplierFactory)
        Parameters:
        contextSupplierFactory - Factory which creates a context to be passed to this factory to create supplier.
        Returns:
        Function factory which creates a context using the context supplier factory and then uses that context and this factory to create a function.
